languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}Deadeye shots{/g} fired by this rifle deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to larger enemies:
-<indent=5%>Hulking creatures (2×2 cells) suffer +5 damage.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Enormous creatures (3×3 cells) suffer +10 damage.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Massive creatures (4×4 cells) suffer +15 damage.</indent>
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}Прицельные{/g} выстрелы из этой винтовки наносят дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} крупным целям:

-<indent=5%>Гигантские существа (4×4 клетки) получают +15 урона.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
This rifle is crafted specifically for hunting large prey.
<indent=5%>+2 additional damage to big creatures, i.e. creatures that occupy more than 1 cell</indent>

{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}Deadeye shots{/g} fired by this rifle deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to larger enemies:

- <indent=5%>对大型生物（2x2格子）造成的伤害提高5点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>对巨型生物（3x3格子）造成的伤害提高10点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>对超巨型生物（4x4格子）造成的伤害提高15点。</indent>

・<indent=5%>大型生物（2×2セル）は+5のダメージを負う。</indent>
